name: Cryptopay Gateway for WooCommerce
author: Cryptopay Team

sections.description:
Accept crypto – get fiat! Make the most of receiving, exchanging and sending crypto globally.

Why use this extension?

A simple solution to start accepting cryptocurrencies.

What’s included

Accept cryptocurrency as a payment method

A wide list of supported cryptocurrencies (BTC, USDT, ETH, LTC, BTH, XLM, XRP, USDC, DAI etc.)

Automatic crypto-to-fiat exchange

A fixed 1% processing fee

A full-featured back office that allows you to safely store, exchange and withdraw funds to a cryptocurrency wallet or bank account.

Benefits

Accept payments globally
No chargebacks
Conclusion
A convenient way to receive, store and manage cryptocurrencies.

Start accepting cryptocurrencies today!

Other details

How can you start accepting cryptocurrency payments?
* Sign up with Cryptopay For Business
* We will send you a service agreement
* Install and set up the plug-in
* Voila! You’re ready to go.
sections.installation:
Please note, this gateway requires WooCommerce 2.6 and above.

We don\’t currently support older versions of WooCommerce.

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To
do an automatic install of, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Cryptopay Gateway for WooCommerce” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking \”Install Now\”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.
sections.faq:
Will you add additional crypto currencies in the future?
Yes, we are currently working hard to add support to more coins.

How can we submit coin requests?
You can email us at b2bsupport@cryptopay.me and we will get back to you as soon as we can
